text:
Yrsa Carola Stenius (7 January 1945 – 19 May 2018) was a Finnish-born Swedish journalist and newspaper editor. She was born in Helsinki, Finland. She was chief editor of the newspaper "Arbetarbladet" from 1972 to 1978. From 1979 she was cultural editor for the newspaper "Aftonbladet" and was appointed chief editor for the newspaper from 1982 to 1987. She wrote several books.
Stenius died suddenly on 19 May 2018 at her home in Stockholm at 73 years old.
